headline.sub: Ukraine, rebels argue over crash site
headline.main: Ukraine, rebels argue over crash site

docs.snippet: Ukraine accuses Russia and pro-Moscow rebels of destroying evidence of "international crimes" while emergency crews work to collect bodies from site of Malaysian plane crash. Jillian Kitchener reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ukraine accuses Russia and pro-Moscow rebels of destroying evidence of "international crimes" while emergency crews work to collect bodies from site of Malaysian plane crash. Jillian Kitchener reports.

headline.print_headline: Ukrainian President Condemns Interference With Work at Crash Site
headline.main: Ukrainian President Condemns Interference With Work at Crash Site

docs.snippet: Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko told Dutch Foreign Minister Frans Timmermans that he would not tolerate interference in the work of international monitors and other experts investigating the Malaysian airliner disaster....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko told Dutch Foreign Minister Frans Timmermans that he would not tolerate interference in the work of international monitors and other experts investigating the Malaysian airliner disaster.

headline.print_headline: Flower Vows to Make Pakistan Batsmen More Consistent
headline.main: Flower Vows to Make Pakistan Batsmen More Consistent

docs.snippet: Pakistan's new batting coach Grant Flower has termed his new assignment as the biggest challenge of his coaching career and is hopeful of making the batsmen more consistent....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pakistan's new batting coach Grant Flower has termed his new assignment as the biggest challenge of his coaching career and is hopeful of making the batsmen more consistent.

docs.snippet: Italian and Maltese naval vessels assisted by a passing cargo ship rescued some 400 migrants aboard a smugglers' boat in waters near Malta and found the bodies of 18 people inside....
docs.lead_paragraph: Italian and Maltese naval vessels assisted by a passing cargo ship rescued some 400 migrants aboard a smugglers' boat in waters near Malta and found the bodies of 18 people inside.

docs.snippet: Russia has placed a U.S. lawmaker and 12 other people connected with the Guantanamo Bay detention camp and the Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq on its list of those banned from entering the country....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia has placed a U.S. lawmaker and 12 other people connected with the Guantanamo Bay detention camp and the Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq on its list of those banned from entering the country.

headline.print_headline: France Secures 1 Billion Euro Navy Deal in Egypt
headline.main: France Secures 1 Billion Euro Navy Deal in Egypt

docs.snippet: France has secured its first major military contract in Egypt in about 20 years with a 1 billion euros (0.79 billion pounds) deal to sell four naval frigates, a French diplomatic source said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: France has secured its first major military contract in Egypt in about 20 years with a 1 billion euros (0.79 billion pounds) deal to sell four naval frigates, a French diplomatic source said on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Alleged Leader of Cocaine Cartel Arrested in Spain
headline.main: Alleged Leader of Cocaine Cartel Arrested in Spain

docs.snippet: Spanish police have arrested one of Colombia's most-wanted criminals, a 40-year-old man nicknamed the Rat who is one of leaders of a ruthless drug cartel linked to 400 murders and the shipment of largest amounts of cocaine to Europe and the United...
docs.lead_paragraph: Spanish police have arrested one of Colombia's most-wanted criminals, a 40-year-old man nicknamed the Rat who is one of leaders of a ruthless drug cartel linked to 400 murders and the shipment of largest amounts of cocaine to Europe and the United States.

headline.print_headline: Italy Says 19 Boat Migrants Die, Thousands Rescued This Week
headline.main: Italy Says 19 Boat Migrants Die, Thousands Rescued This Week

docs.snippet: Nineteen people died trying to reach Italy on a boat packed with hundreds of migrants, probably poisoned by carbon monoxide fumes from its engines, said the Italian Navy on Saturday, which has rescued more than 4,000 migrants in the last three day...
docs.lead_paragraph: Nineteen people died trying to reach Italy on a boat packed with hundreds of migrants, probably poisoned by carbon monoxide fumes from its engines, said the Italian Navy on Saturday, which has rescued more than 4,000 migrants in the last three days.

headline.print_headline: Half Day for 'Voice of Open' Robson
headline.main: Half Day for 'Voice of Open' Robson

docs.snippet: Ivor Robson, whose dulcet Scottish tones have been introducing the players on the first tee at the Open for 40 years, was at a loose end on Saturday because of an unprecedented two-tee start....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ivor Robson, whose dulcet Scottish tones have been introducing the players on the first tee at the Open for 40 years, was at a loose end on Saturday because of an unprecedented two-tee start.

headline.print_headline: Russia Calls on Kiev, Rebels to Help Experts at Plane Crash Site
headline.main: Russia Calls on Kiev, Rebels to Help Experts at Plane Crash Site

docs.snippet: Russia called on Ukraine's authorities and rebels on Saturday to give international experts access to the crash site of a Malaysian Airlines plane, the foreign ministry said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia called on Ukraine's authorities and rebels on Saturday to give international experts access to the crash site of a Malaysian Airlines plane, the foreign ministry said.
